scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary enthroned, holding the Christ Child. She is crowned and wears a blue mantle over a gold-trimmed garment. The Christ Child is looking towards the viewer. To the left, an angel with large wings kneels and plays a pipe. To the right, another angel kneels and plays a lute. Above the Virgin Mary, a dove, symbolizing the Holy Spirit, descends. In the background, a landscape with rolling hills is visible, and a distant church tower with a spire can be seen. The entire scene is framed by an arched border with gold illumination and decorative elements.
